name: Christmas Escort
description:
Times are tough and Christmas is in danger. Elves need to get more serious and bring out the big guns. Help Yogscast team and their elves deliver presents to children! Control two characters at the same time!

Elves squad assembled to save Christmas!

Game made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019.

Created by Crystal Apps team
www.crystalapps.eu
Art by
https://www.instagram.com/kwad_rat
https://www.instagram.com/wiktor.biedron
Coded by
